long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just for early versions you can visit your social media sites, e-mail sites and just for a bonus your mining sites with just one click. Also you can save tabs you visit.

---Version 2.0----
-Added Dynamic Integration. You can now save 3 more tabs whatever you like.
-Changed the logo of app.
-Added clear all data in case of any bugs show up.

---Version 2.1----
-Fixed some bugs
-Changed the style of app
-Added new feature: You can now copy and paste or type your webpage and hit enter to save it into saved tabs.

---Version 2.2----
-Fixed  bugs
-Changed the style of app
-Added info when hovered onto buttons

Privacy:
https://github.com/ozgursef/Chrome-Tab-Saver-Extension-/blob/main/PRIVACY.md
